des: "This delightful cocktail was a hit at the country club where we had my cousin's bridal shower.  As soon they tasted mine, everyone was up there ordering one from the bartender."
ins: Pour the vodka, coffee liqueur, creme de menthe, and Irish cream into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a mint leaf to serve.
